{children.map((c, i) => )}

case 'h4': return

case 'p': return

case 'ul': return
    {children.map((c, i) => )}
case 'li': return
  • {children.map((c, i) => )}
    • case 'mention': return case 'clause': return default: return children ? children.map((c, i) => ) : null } }
